actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5 of the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Dolores in Utah for potential addition to the wild and scenic river system.

summary.text: Designates a portion of the Dolores River in Utah (from the Utah- Colorado boundary to the Colorado River) for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5 of the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Dolores in Utah for potential addition to the wild and scenic river system.
